data.name: Descension
data.detailed_description:
Join The Discord

https://discord.gg/cpRTGZPV


About the Game

Descension is a Horror themed FPS That features FREE episodic releases, and large open-world environments. What sets it apart from other indie games like it, is The Impressive visual quality, focus on dark Atmosphere, and Great Presentation. It focuses on the theories of the multiverse, and the horrors that might come from far-gone exploration. The goal in each episode is completing objectives within the open-world levels while taking on terrifying enemies. Each episode will have a Main Antagonist that will hunt you throughout the entirety of your playthrough. The arcade-like FPS combat is Hard, interesting and crucial to Descensions gameplay formula. Descension is aimed to be a fun, scary, and replayable experience.
